Localization.Name: Greycat Industrial
Localization.Description: A trusted manufacturer of industrial tools since 2337, the company’s extensive line of industrial equipment and armor make it one of the most respected brand names around. Greycat has remained a UEE staple for centuries thanks to their streamlined-yet-inventive designs, exacting safety standards, and a diverse product line.

English.Name: Greycat Industrial
English.Description: A trusted manufacturer of industrial tools since 2337, the company’s extensive line of industrial equipment and armor make it one of the most respected brand names around. Greycat has remained a UEE staple for centuries thanks to their streamlined-yet-inventive designs, exacting safety standards, and a diverse product line.

Localization.Name: OptiMax
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: Greycat Industrial
Item Type: Mining Gadget

Resistance: -30%
Cluster Modifier: +60%

Optimal Charge Window Size: -30%

Commonly found on industrial sites across the empire, the OptiMax reduces the loss of valuable resource through a special process that keeps them clustered together. This technology does impose drawbacks on the gadget though, most notably a reduced optimal charge window. 

Manufacturer Warning! Using more than one mining gadget per deposit can result in a catastrophic explosion.

array.locVar:
Manufacturer: Greycat Industrial
Item Type: Mining Gadget

Resistance: -30%
Cluster Modifier: +60%

Optimal Charge Window Size: -30%

Commonly found on industrial sites across the empire, the OptiMax reduces the loss of valuable resource through a special process that keeps them clustered together. This technology does impose drawbacks on the gadget though, most notably a reduced optimal charge window. 

Manufacturer Warning! Using more than one mining gadget per deposit can result in a catastrophic explosion.

Manufacturer: Greycat Industrial
Item Type: Mining Gadget

Laser Instability: -35%
Optimal Charge Window Size: +100%

Optimal Charge Window Rate: -30%

A unique chipset allows the WaveShift to keep instability in check while dramatically increasing the size of the optimal charge window. Though the optimal charge window will fill slower, the larger target area makes it easier to find the perfect spot to shatter a deposit. 

Manufacturer Warning! Using more than one mining gadget per deposit can result in a catastrophic explosion.

Manufacturer: Shubin Interstellar
Item Type: Mining Gadget

Optimal Charge Window Size: +50%
Optimal Charge Window Rate: +100%

Cluster Modifier: -20%

Increase the size and fill speed of the optimal charge window with the Okunis. While this powerful gadget makes it easier to work a deposit, some valuable resource will be lost when it shatters.  

Manufacturer Warning! Using more than one mining gadget per deposit can result in a catastrophic explosion.

Manufacturer: Shubin Interstellar
Item Type: Mining Gadget

Optimal Charge Window Size: +50%
Resistance: -50%

Instability: +15%

Make that tough deposit easier to crack with the Sabir. It uses a special sensor to modulate laser power and adjust it to that particular deposit. The effect increases instability but also provides a dramatic drop in resistance and an increased optimal charge window to make mining it easier. 

Manufacturer Warning! Using more than one mining gadget per deposit can result in a catastrophic explosion.

Manufacturer: Thermyte Concern
Item Type: Mining Gadget

Laser Instability: -70%
Cluster Modifier: 30%

Resistance: 10%

The BoreMax helps focus laser power to reduce instability significantly, while also keeping clusters of valuable deposits together upon shattering. While it does make it more difficult and time-consuming to bypass the deposit's resistance, most miners find the extra safety and increased yield worth the extra effort.

Manufacturer Warning! Using more than one mining gadget per deposit can result in a catastrophic explosion.

Manufacturer: Thermyte Concern
Item Type: Mining Gadget

Laser Instability: -35%
Cluster Modifier: +30%
Optimal Charge Window Rate: +50%

Optimal Charge Window Size: -30%

The Stalwart is for miners looking to wield power precisely. The gadget reduces the optimal charge window size, making miners skillfully manage conditions to find the sweet spot. Once there, the increased power will fill the optimal charge window faster while also keeping clusters of valuable ore together.  

Manufacturer Warning! Using more than one mining gadget per deposit can result in a catastrophic explosion.
